posts.post_title: WTB Mayo and Old Judge louisville players
posts.post_content:
Posted By: william turner
Hello, I have not posted in a while but I am looking for any condition on mayo and old judge louisville players, really to be honest I just want to be able to own just one card even of a louisville player.  As stated, all conditions are fine with me no matter how low grade the card is.  If anyone has anything just post or contact me at my email address.  Thanks as always

William
